name: Soldiers Fire Guns Journey
description:
Soldiers Fire Guns Journey is a combat fighting game about a wanted commando rombo metal shooter and the soldiers enemy will use any weapon to hunt him down! From the shooters,infantry to tanks, helicopters and mortar attack ..
FEATURES:
- HD Quality Audio
- Lots of enemies to fight.
- Tap Jump button to jump avoid obstacles or wanna dramatic kills.
- Different characters to choose.
